title: Interchange the variables x and y
text: Replace x with y and then y with x.

title: What's the equation after replacing x with y and y with x
Solve for y
text: solve for y and find the result

title: Solve for y
text: We can subtract 5 from each side then divide by 8. It gives us $$y=\frac{x-5}{8}$$. We can further simplify it into y $$=\frac{x}{8}-\frac{5}{8}$$.
